name: netflix-prime-auto-skip
description: Auto Skip Intro, Recaps for Prime and Netflix

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && microbundle -f modern --sourcemap false && npm run post
scripts.build:dev: rm -rf dist && microbundle -f modern && npm run post:dev
scripts.post:dev: mv dist/bundle_new.modern.js dist/bundle_new.js & mv dist/bundle_new.modern.js.map dist/bundle_new.js.map
scripts.publish: rm -rf ../final_build && mkdir ../final_build/ && mkdir ../final_build/src/ && cp -R {manifest.json,dist} ../final_build/ && cp -R src/{assets,popup.html,styles,background.js} ../final_build/src/ && cd .. && zip -r final_build_$npm_package_version.zip final_build
scripts.final: npm run build && npm run publish

author: Naman Malhotra
